alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 6:31AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN PORTAGE... NORTHWESTERN WINNEBAGO...WAUSHARA AND SOUTHERN WAUPACA COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM CDT... At 631 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Plainfield to near Friendship to near Elroy. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Waupaca, Wautoma, Redgranite, Plainfield, Fremont, Chain O` Lakes-King, Napowan Scout Camp, Lake Poygan, Hartman Creek State Park, and Silver Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
